title: Putrescent Poems
description: A collection of poetry that speaks to the inner most fears, the werewolves, the viruses, the claws and the darkest spots of our mind. These twenty spine tingling poems, and ten pieces of haunting art, are sure to make your day more thrilling!These poems, and the pictures that accompany them, cover a wide variety of topics, all with one them - HORROR!
author: Katelynn E.  Koontz
